title: Role Model and Data Access Layer
description: Create the backend models and data access functions for roles and permissions. Implement the core data layer for role management.

phases.title: Role Model Implementation
phases.description: Create the Role model class with basic CRUD operations and data validation
deliverables: Role model class with id, name, description fields
Basic CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)

phases.title: Permission Model Implementation
phases.description: Create the Permission model class with CRUD operations and validation for permission data
deliverables: Permission model class with id, name, resource, action fields

phases.title: User-Role Relationship Models
phases.description: Implement the relationship models between users and roles, including many-to-many relationships

phases.title: Database Service Layer
phases.description: Create database service functions that handle role operations and data access

phases.title: Data Validation and Utilities
phases.description: Implement comprehensive validation functions and utility methods for role and permission data
deliverables: Input validation schemas for roles and permissions
